amendment.description: An amendment numbered 72 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funding for the Environmental Protection Agency's Justice, Equity, Diversity and Inclusion Workgroup.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
